detaileddescription.para: Updating value of functional property for ComfortOpen - Setup part

This function updates Setup related byte of functional property and also personalized properties stored in NvM. Its behavior is different depending on function availability.
reentrant No context task context thread safe No - Integration must insure that the function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No - All APIs needs to be called from the same core synchronous
N/A.
N/A.
void
void Globals
[in,out] BH_DL_ComfortOpen [in,out] NvMPim_BAPHandler_DL_PSO_prop_ps [in,out] NvMPim_BAPHandler_DL_prop_ps Input->Output-Correlation
If functionality is not active, following default flags are set to true:
NvMPim_BAPHandler_DL_PSO_prop_ps[DL_ComfortOpen_Setup].flag_s[PSO_USER].isDefault_u2 = TRUE
NvMPim_BAPHandler_DL_prop_ps->comfortOpenSetup5_isDefault = TRUE
And as a consequence of that, following variables are set to default:
BH_DL_ComfortOpen.data_pu8[DL_COMFORTOPEN_SETUP_BPos]
NvMPim_BAPHandler_DL_PSO_prop_ps[DL_ComfortOpen_Setup].value_au8[PSO_USER]
NvMPim_BAPHandler_DL_prop_ps->comfortOpenSetup5_u8 Their value is taken from adaptations and codings.

If functionality is active, BH_DL_ComfortOpen.data_pu8[DL_COMFORTOPEN_SETUP_BPos] is set according to values from:
NvMPim_BAPHandler_DL_PSO_prop_ps[DL_ComfortOpen_Setup].value_au8[PSO_USER]
NvMPim_BAPHandler_DL_prop_ps->comfortOpenSetup5_u8
Also bits DL_COMFORTOPEN_SETUP_6_bPos and DL_COMFORTOPEN_SETUP_7_bPos of BH_DL_ComfortOpen.data_pu8[DL_COMFORTOPEN_SETUP_BPos] are always set to FALSE

reentrant No context task context thread safe No - Integration must insure that the function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No - All APIs needs to be called from the same core synchronous
N/A.
N/A.
void
void Globals
[in,out] BH_DL_AutoLock [in,out] NvMPim_BAPHandler_DL_PSO_prop_ps Input->Output-Correlation
If functionality is not active, following default flag is set to true:
NvMPim_BAPHandler_DL_PSO_prop_ps[DL_AutoLock].flag_s[PSO_USER].isDefault_u2 = TRUE
And as a consequence of that, following variables are set to default:
BH_DL_AutoLock.data_pu8[DL_AUTOLOCK_SETUP_BPos]
NvMPim_BAPHandler_DL_PSO_prop_ps[DL_AutoLock].value_au8[PSO_USER]

Their value is taken from adaptations and codings. If functionality is active, BH_DL_AutoLock.data_pu8[DL_AUTOLOCK_SETUP_BPos] is set to:
NvMPim_BAPHandler_DL_PSO_prop_ps[DL_AutoLock].value_au8[PSO_USER]
